boards.title: Updates & Announcements
boards.description: Updates, changes, and additions to MAL.

boards.title: MAL Guidelines & FAQ
boards.description: Site rules, forum rules, database guidelines, review/recommendation guidelines, and other helpful information.

boards.title: DB Modification Requests
boards.description: Ask questions or submit changes (that you are unable to edit on the entry page) in the applicable board.

boards.title: Support
boards.description: Have a problem using the site or think you found a bug? Post here.

boards.title: Suggestions
boards.description: Have an idea or suggestion for the site? Share it here.

boards.title: MAL Contests
boards.description: Our season-long anime game and other user competitions can be found here.

boards.title: News Discussion
boards.description: Current news in anime and manga.

boards.title: Anime & Manga Recommendations
boards.description: Ask the community for series recommendations or help other users looking for suggestions.

boards.title: Series Discussion
boards.description: Post in episode and chapter discussion threads or talk about specific anime and manga in their series' boards.

boards.title: Anime Discussion
boards.description: General anime discussion that is not specific to any particular series.

boards.title: Manga Discussion
boards.description: General manga discussion that is not specific to any particular series.

boards.title: Introductions
boards.description: New to MyAnimeList? Introduce yourself here.

boards.title: Games, Computers & Tech Support
boards.description: Discuss visual novels and other video games, or ask our community a computer related question.

boards.title: Music & Entertainment
boards.description: Asian music and live-action series, Western media and artists, best-selling novels, etc.

boards.title: Current Events
boards.description: World headlines, the latest in science, sports competitions, and other debate topics.

boards.title: Casual Discussion
boards.description: General interest topics that don't fall into one of the sub-categories above, such as community polls.

boards.title: Creative Corner
boards.description: Show your creations to get help or feedback from our community. Graphics, list designs, stories; anything goes.

boards.title: Forum Games
boards.description: Fun forum games are contained here.
